mapper.select: SELECT a.user_sub_id as userSubId, a.subcategory_id as subcategoryId, s.name as subName, a.user_id as userId FROM user_subcategory a, subcategory s WHERE a.user_id=#{userId} AND a.subcategory_id = s.subcategory_id AND a.status = 1

SELECT DISTINCT a.user_sub_id as userSubId, u.name as userName, u.user_id as userId, a.subcategory_id as subcategoryId, s.name as subName, a.user_id as userId FROM user_subcategory a, subcategory s, user u WHERE a.user_id != 2 AND a.subcategory_id = s.subcategory_id AND a.status = 1 AND a.user_id = u.user_id AND u.status = 1 AND a.user_id NOT IN ( SELECT r.reported_user_id FROM report r WHERE a.user_id = r.reported_user_id AND r.user_id = 2 ) AND a.user_id NOT IN ( SELECT r.user_id FROM report r WHERE a.user_id = r.user_id AND r.reported_user_id = 2 ) GROUP BY a.user_id LIMIT 3

SELECT DISTINCT a.user_sub_id as userSubId, u.name as userName, u.user_id as userId, a.subcategory_id as subcategoryId, s.name as subName, a.user_id as userId FROM user_subcategory a, subcategory s, user u WHERE a.user_id != 2 AND a.subcategory_id = s.subcategory_id AND a.status = 1 AND a.user_id = u.user_id AND u.status = 1 AND a.user_id NOT IN ( SELECT r.reported_user_id FROM report r WHERE a.user_id = r.reported_user_id AND r.user_id = 2 ) AND a.user_id NOT IN ( SELECT r.user_id FROM report r WHERE a.user_id = r.user_id AND r.reported_user_id = 2 ) GROUP BY a.user_id LIMIT 5
